content: Alert: DDoS false Alarm has occurred!

fields.name: Memory
fields.value:
Total: $exec.system.memory_info.total_memory GB
Used: $exec.system.memory_info.used_memory GB
Free: $exec.system.memory_info.available_memory GB
Usage: $exec.system.memory_info.memory_percentage%

fields.name: CPU
fields.value:
Physical Cores: $exec.system.cpu_info.physical_cores
Total Cores: $exec.system.cpu_info.total_cores
Processor Speed: $exec.system.cpu_info.processor_speed MHz
Total CPU Usage: $exec.system.cpu_info.total_cpu_usage%

fields.name: Disk
fields.value:
Total Space: $exec.system.disk_info.total_space GB
Used Space: $exec.system.disk_info.used_space GB
Free Space: $exec.system.disk_info.free_space GB
Usage: $exec.system.disk_info.usage_percentage%
